com.revolsys.io

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revolsys.io.FileUtil

  • public final class FileUtil
extends Object
    The FileUtil class is a utility class for performing common tasks with classes from the java.io package.
    Author:
    Paul Austin

        public static long copy(File file,
        OutputStream out)
                 throws IOException
        Copy the contents of the file to the output stream. The output stream will need to be closed manually after invoking this method.

        file - The file to read the contents from.
        out - The output stream to write the contents to.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

        Parameters:

        file - file path where this entry will be saved
        sz - file size

        Copy the contents of the input stream to the output stream. The input stream and output stream will need to be closed manually after invoking this method.
        Parameters:
        in - The input stream to read the contents from.
        out - The output stream to write the contents to.

      • copy

        public static void copy(Reader in,
        File file)
        Copy the contents of the reader to the file. The reader will need to be closed manually after invoking this method.
        Parameters:
        in - The reader to read the contents from.
        file - The file to write the contents to.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

      • copy

        Writer out)
        Copy the contents of the reader to the writer. The reader and writer will need to be closed manually after invoking this method.
        Parameters:
        in - The reader to read the contents from.
        out - The writer to write the contents to.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

        public static boolean deleteDirectory(File directory)
        Delete a directory and all the files and sub directories below the directory.
        Parameters:

      • deleteDirectory

        public static boolean deleteDirectory(File directory,
                      boolean deleteRoot)
        Delete all the files and sub directories below the directory. If the deleteRoot flag is true the directory will also be deleted.
        Parameters:
        directory - The directory to delete.
        deleteRoot - Flag indicating if the directory should also be deleted.
        Throws:
        IOException - If a file or directory could not be deleted.

      • deleteDirectory

        public static void deleteDirectory(File directory,
                   FilenameFilter filter)

      • deleteFileOnExit

        public static void deleteFileOnExit(File file)
        Add the file to be deleted on exit. If the file is a directory the directory and it's contents will be deleted. DON'T use in web applications
        Parameters:
        file - The file or directory to delete.

      • getRelativePath

        public static String getRelativePath(File parentDirectory,
                     File file)
        Return the relative path of the file from the parentDirectory. For example the relative path of c:\Data\Files\file1.txt and c:\Data would be Files\file1.txt.
        Parameters:
        parentDirectory - The parent directory.
        file - The file to return the relative path for.
        Returns:
        The relative path.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
